nodes.docs:
Returns the chain ID associated with the current network.

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/actions/public/getChainId
- JSON-RPC Methods: [`eth_chainId`](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/apis/json-rpc/#eth_chainid)
